languages.text: "Инцидент N872-04 — это некий огромный сбой, затронувший все системы корабля. С ним и "Эпитафией" как-то связано то, что корабль стал лучше летать".
"Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."
languages.original_text: "Инцидент N872-04 — это некий огромный сбой, затронувший все системы корабля. С ним и "Эпитафией" как-то связано то, что корабль стал лучше летать".

traits.locale_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."
"Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."
"Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."
"Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

languages.text: «El incidente N872-04 fue un fallo generalizado de los sistemas de la nave. Junto con "Epitafio", tiene alguna relación con la capacidad de vuelo mejorada de la nave».
languages.original_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

traits.locale_text: «El incidente N872-04 fue un fallo generalizado de los sistemas de la nave. Junto con "Epitafio", tiene alguna relación con la capacidad de vuelo mejorada de la nave».

languages.text: 「N872-04事件は船全体のシステム障害のようなものだった。それと『エピタフ』が船の飛行改善に関係していた」
languages.original_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

traits.locale_text: 「N872-04事件は船全体のシステム障害のようなものだった。それと『エピタフ』が船の飛行改善に関係していた」

languages.text: “N872-04号事故是某种全舰范围内的系统故障，这场事故与荒垄碑碣都与‘让这艘舰船变得更好’这个目的有关。”
languages.original_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

traits.locale_text: “N872-04号事故是某种全舰范围内的系统故障，这场事故与荒垄碑碣都与‘让这艘舰船变得更好’这个目的有关。”

languages.text: « L'incident N872-04 a provoqué une défaillance des systèmes de tout le vaisseau. Lui et "Épitaphe" ont quelque chose à voir avec l'amélioration de ses capacités de vol. »
languages.original_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

traits.locale_text: « L'incident N872-04 a provoqué une défaillance des systèmes de tout le vaisseau. Lui et "Épitaphe" ont quelque chose à voir avec l'amélioration de ses capacités de vol. »

languages.text: "Vorfall N872-04 war ein unbekanntes schiffsweites Systemversagen. Der Vorfall und 'Epitaph' hatten etwas damit zu tun, dass das Schiff besser geflogen werden konnte."
languages.original_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

traits.locale_text: "Vorfall N872-04 war ein unbekanntes schiffsweites Systemversagen. Der Vorfall und 'Epitaph' hatten etwas damit zu tun, dass das Schiff besser geflogen werden konnte."

languages.text: "N872-04 Sayılı Hadise, gemi genelinde meydana gelen bir sistem arızasıymış. Bu hadise ve 'Sinyazıt', geminin daha iyi uçmasıyla bağlantılıymış."
languages.original_text: "Incident N872-04 was a ship-wide system failure of some kind. It and 'Epitaph' had something to do with the ship flying better."

traits.locale_text: "N872-04 Hadisesi, gemi genelinde meydana gelen bir sistem hatasıymış. Bu hadise ve 'Kitabe', geminin daha iyi uçmasıyla bağlantılıymış."
